subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: From 18 points up to 1 down, to 5 up and, ultimately, to 2 down after a Paul Pierce buzzer beater, the Nets were as inconsistent as a team could be in their loss to the Boston Celtics on Saturday night.
snippet: From 18 points up to 1 down, to 5 up and, ultimately, to 2 down after a Paul Pierce buzzer beater, the Nets were as inconsistent as a team could be in their loss to the Boston Celtics on Saturday night.
